title: The 20 key shows from Paris fashion week – in pictures
text: JUNYA WATANABE Junya Watanabe took one idea, the trench coat, and ran with it this season. First appearing in its classic form and slowly building with a double collar, two coats layered and fused, then came the dissecting and reconstructing of panels. Watanabe transformed the trench further into a skirt, pinafore dress and a corset moulded into a shirt, wrapping the waist and creating structure, later turning it upside down and adding volume with knife pleats. Pops of neon pink, orange and green lifted the looks, as did colourful printed leggings. On our wish list: neon and snake-print shoes.
description: From Chanel’s Paris rooftop parade to Givenchy’s 1993 flashback, the Observer’s fashion team pick the highlights from the spring/summer 2020 shows
